com.yantra.api.ycd

Interface checkNoHasslePriceMatch

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    com.yantra.api.YCDApi, YIFApi

    public interface checkNoHasslePriceMatch

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      org.w3c.dom.Document checkNoHasslePriceMatch(YFSEnvironment env, org.w3c.dom.Document inXML)
      The checkNoHasslePriceMatch Api validates if a Price Match meets the "no-hassle" criteria based on the Price Match rules defined.

    • Method Detail

      • checkNoHasslePriceMatch

        org.w3c.dom.Document checkNoHasslePriceMatch(YFSEnvironment env,
                                             org.w3c.dom.Document inXML)
                                      throws com.yantra.yfs.japi.YFSException,
                                             java.rmi.RemoteException
        The checkNoHasslePriceMatch Api validates if a Price Match meets the "no-hassle" criteria based on the Price Match rules defined. This API takes the new unit price, shipping charges and discounts and compares it with the existing unit price, existing shipping charges and existing discounts to decide whether the Price Match can be applied. The rules YCD_PRICE_MATCH_PRICE_DIFFERENCE_LIMIT, YCD_PRICE_MATCH_PRICE_PERCENTAGE_DIFFERENCE_LIMIT are used to perform this validation. This API also checks whether the quantity for which Price Match is being performed is valid based on the rule YCD_PRICE_MATCH_ORDERQUANTITY_LIMIT. This API takes the OrderHeaderKey and OrderLineKey for which the Price Match is being performed, but does not do any specific validation with this OrderHeaderKey and OrderLineKey. An order can be identified by the following: - OrderHeaderKey - EnterpriseCode, DocumentType and OrderNo. A line can be identified by the following: - OrderLineKey - PrimeLineNo and SubLineNo. CompetitorTotalPrice, ExistingTotalPrice, MinimumQuantity are mandatory parameters for this API.

        Related Documents
        Input XML Input DTD Output XML Output DTD Error XML Error DTD

        User Exits:

          com.yantra.pca.ycd.japi.ue.YCDCheckNoHasslePriceMatchUE
            This user exit invoked unconditionally if implemented. The output of the user exit is merged into the final output of the API. The error code YCD00032 is thrown if an exception occurs during the invocation of this user exit.

          Events Raised: None

          Audits: None

          Pre-conditions: None

          Post-conditions: None

          Output Template Support: No

          Additional Information
          This UserExit is not implemented


        Parameters:
        env - Required. Environment handle returned by the createEnvironment API.
        inXML - Required. Contains attributes of the Price match to be verified and OrderLine key of the OrderLine. For more information, see the associated input xml files.

        Returns:
        An XML document that contains the result of Verification of the PriceMatch output files.
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException - Java's default remote exception handler.
        com.yantra.yfs.japi.YFSException - Exception containing error codes in the standard error files.
